alert.note: Alert for Dickinson (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Sioux Falls (Southeastern SD, Southwestern MN, and Northwestern IA)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued June 05 at 10:28AM CDT until further notice by NWS Sioux Falls
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Sioux Falls SD has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Iowa... Little Sioux River near Milford affecting Dickinson County. ...Forecast flooding changed from Minor to Moderate severity for the following rivers in South Dakota... James River near Forestburg affecting Sanborn County. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS MORNING UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Little Sioux River near Milford. * WHEN...From this morning until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 12.0 feet, minor flooding of low lying agricultural lands begins. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:00 AM CDT Sunday the stage was 12.3 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 10:00 AM CDT Sunday was 12.3 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage late this afternoon and continue falling to 8.8 feet Friday morning. - Flood stage is 12.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (1 PM CDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Mon Tue Wed Little Sioux River Milford 12.0 12.3 Sun 10 AM CD 10.7 9.8 9.3 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Stay tuned to further developments by listening to your local radio, television, or NOAA Weather Radio for further information. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued Monday afternoon at 1230 PM CDT.
